short.ar: ملخص مجاني مدعوم من ChatGPT للمواقع الإلكترونية، ومقاطع يوتيوب، وملفات PDF. إضافة واحدة لتلخيص كل شيء!
short.am: ዌብሳይቶች፣ ዩቲዩብ ቪዲዮዎች እና PDF ለማጠቃለል ChatGPT-የተነሳሳየ ነፃ ጠቅላላ አሳያ። ሁሉንም ለማጠቃለል አንድ ተጨማሪ!
short.bg: Безплатен резюматор с поддръжка от ChatGPT за уебсайтове, YouTube видеа и PDF файлове. Едно разширение за резюмиране на всичко!
short.bn: ওয়েবসাইট, ইউটিউব ভিডিও এবং PDF জন্য ChatGPT-পাওয়ার্ড বিনামূল্যে সারাংশকারী। একটি এক্সটেনশন দিয়ে সবকিছু সারাংশ করুন!
short.ca: Resumidor gratuït alimentat per ChatGPT per a llocs web, vídeos de YouTube i PDF. Una extensió per resumir-ho tot!
short.cs: ChatGPT-poháněný bezplatný shrnovač pro webové stránky, YouTube videa a PDF. Jedno rozšíření pro shrnutí všeho!
short.da: ChatGPT-drevet gratis opsummeringsværktøj til websites, YouTube-videoer og PDF'er. Én udvidelse til at opsummere det hele!
short.de: ChatGPT-betriebener kostenloser Zusammenfasser für Websites, YouTube-Videos und PDFs. Eine Erweiterung, um alles zusammenzufassen!
short.el: Δωρεάν συνοπτικό εργαλείο με την υποστήριξη του ChatGPT για ιστοσελίδες, βίντεο στο YouTube και PDF. Μία επέκταση για να συνοψίσετε…
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,ms: ChatGPT-powered free Website, YouTube video and PDF summarizer. One extension to summarize everything!
short.es: Resumidor gratuito impulsado por ChatGPT para sitios web, vídeos de YouTube y PDF. ¡Una extensión para resumirlo todo!
short.es_419: Resumidor gratuito impulsado por ChatGPT para sitios web, videos de YouTube y PDF. ¡Una extensión para resumirlo todo!
short.et: ChatGPT-toega tasuta kokkuvõtja veebisaitidele, YouTube videotele ja PDF-idele. Üks laiendus, et kokku võtta kõik!
short.fa: خلاصه‌ساز رایگان مبتنی بر ChatGPT برای وب‌سایت‌ها، ویدیوهای یوتیوب و PDF. یک افزونه برای خلاصه‌سازی همه چیز!
short.fi: ChatGPT-voimainen ilmainen tiivistäjä verkkosivuille, YouTube-videoille ja PDF-tiedostoille. Yksi laajennus tiivistää kaiken!
short.fil: Libreng taga-buod na pinapatakbo ng ChatGPT para sa mga website, YouTube videos at PDF. Isang extension para buurin ang lahat!
short.fr: Résumeur gratuit alimenté par ChatGPT pour les sites Web, les vidéos YouTube et les PDF. Une extension pour tout résumer!
short.gu: વેબસાઇટ્સ, યુટ્યુબ વિડિઓ અને PDF માટે ChatGPT-દ્વારા સપોર્ટેડ મુક્ત સારાંશકાર. બધું સારાંશિત કરવા માટે એક એક્સટેન્શન!
short.he: מקצר חינמי מופעל על ידי ChatGPT לאתרים, סרטוני YouTube וקובצי PDF. תוסף אחד לסיכום הכול!
short.hi: वेबसाइट्स, यूट्यूब वीडियो और PDF के लिए ChatGPT-द्वारा संचालित मुफ्त संक्षेपक। सब कुछ संक्षेप में बताने के लिए एक ही एक्सटेंशन!
short.hr: Besplatan sažimač pokretan ChatGPT-om za web stranice, YouTube videe i PDF-ove. Jedna ekstenzija za sažimanje svega!
short.hu: ChatGPT által működtetett ingyenes összefoglaló weboldalakhoz, YouTube videókhoz és PDF-ekhez. Egy bővítmény, ami mindent…
short.id: Perangkat ringkasan gratis didukung oleh ChatGPT untuk situs web, video YouTube, dan PDF. Satu ekstensi untuk merangkum semuanya!
short.it: Riassuntore gratuito alimentato da ChatGPT per siti web, video YouTube e PDF. Un'estensione per riassumere tutto!
short.ja: Webサイト、YouTube動画、PDF用のChatGPTによる無料の要約ツール。すべてを要約するための1つの拡張機能！
short.kn: ವೆಬ್ಸೈಟ್ಗಳಿಗೆ, ಯೂಟ್ಯೂಬ್ ವೀಡಿಯೊಗಳಿಗೆ ಮತ್ತು PDF ಗಳಿಗೆ ChatGPT-ಇಂದ ಬಲಪಡಿಸಿದ ಉಚಿತ ಸಾರಾಂಶಕ. ಎಲ್ಲವನ್ನೂ ಸಾರಾಂಶಿಸಲು ಒಂದು ವಿಸ್ತರಣೆ!
short.ko: 웹사이트, YouTube 동영상, PDF를 위한 ChatGPT-구동 무료 요약기. 모든 것을 요약하는 하나의 확장 프로그램!
short.lt: Nemokamas santraukos kūrėjas, varomas ChatGPT, skirtas svetainėms, YouTube vaizdo įrašams ir PDF. Vienas plėtinys viską…
short.lv: Bezmaksas kopsavilkuma rīks ar ChatGPT atbalstu tīmekļa vietnēm, YouTube video un PDF. Viena paplašinājuma programma, lai…
short.ml: വെബ്സൈറ്റുകൾ, യൂട്യൂബ് വീഡിയോകൾ, പി.ഡി.എഫ് ഫയലുകൾക്കായി ChatGPT പിന്തുണയുള്ള സൗജന്യ സംഗ്രഹകാരന്‍. എല്ലാം സംഗ്രഹപ്പെടുത്താനൊരു…
short.mr: वेबसाइट्स, यूट्यूब व्हिडिओ आणि PDF साठी ChatGPT-द्वारे संचालित मोफत संक्षेपक. सर्व काही संक्षेपित करण्यासाठी एक विस्तार!
short.nl: Gratis samenvatter aangedreven door ChatGPT voor websites, YouTube-video's en PDF's. Eén extensie om alles samen te vatten!
short.no: Gratis sammendragsverktøy drevet av ChatGPT for nettsteder, YouTube-videoer og PDF. Én utvidelse for å oppsummere alt!
short.pl: Darmowy skracacz tekstów zasilany przez ChatGPT dla stron internetowych, filmów na YouTube i plików PDF. Jedno rozszerzenie do…
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Resumidor gratuito alimentado por ChatGPT para sites, vídeos do YouTube e PDFs. Uma extensão para resumir tudo!
short.ro: Rezumator gratuit alimentat de ChatGPT pentru site-uri web, videoclipuri YouTube și PDF-uri. O singură extensie pentru a rezuma…
short.ru: Бесплатный сумматор на базе ChatGPT для сайтов, видео на YouTube и PDF. Одно расширение для суммирования всего!
short.sk: Bezplatný sumarizátor poháňaný ChatGPT pre webové stránky, YouTube videá a PDF. Jedno rozšírenie na zhrnutie všetkého!
short.sl: Brezplačni povzetkar na podlagi ChatGPT za spletne strani, YouTube videe in PDF datoteke. Ena razširitev za povzetek vsega!
short.sr: Besplatan rezač teksta podržan od strane ChatGPT za veb-sajtove, YouTube video i PDF. Jedna ekstenzija za rezimiranje svega!
short.sv: Gratis sammanfattare drivet av ChatGPT för webbplatser, YouTube-videor och PDF. Ett tillägg för att sammanfatta allt!
short.sw: Muhtasari wa bure unaotumia ChatGPT kwa tovuti, video za YouTube na PDF. Upanuzi mmoja kwa kufupisha kila kitu!
short.ta: வெப்சைட்கள், யூடியூப் வீடியோக்கள், பி.டி.எப் கோப்புகளுக்கு ChatGPT மூலம் வழங்கப்படும் இலவச சுருக்க கருவி. எல்லாவற்றையும் சுருக்க…
short.te: వెబ్‌సైట్లు, యూట్యూబ్ వీడియోలు, PDFలకు ChatGPT ద్వారా నడిచే ఉచిత సారాంశకారం. అన్నిటినీ సారాంశించడానికి ఒకే పొడగింట!
short.th: เครื่องมือสรุปฟรีที่ขับเคลื่อนด้วย ChatGPT สำหรับเว็บไซต์, วิดีโอ YouTube และ PDF ส่วนขยายเดียวสรุปทั้งหมด!
short.tr: Web siteleri, YouTube videoları ve PDF için ChatGPT destekli ücretsiz özetleyici. Her şeyi özetlemek için tek bir eklenti!
short.uk: Безкоштовний резюматор на базі ChatGPT для веб-сайтів, відео на YouTube та PDF. Одне розширення для резюмування всього!
short.vi: Công cụ tóm tắt miễn phí được hỗ trợ bởi ChatGPT cho các trang web, video YouTube và PDF. Một tiện ích mở rộng để tóm tắt mọi thứ!
short.zh_CN: 由ChatGPT驱动的免费摘要工具，适用于网站、YouTube视频和PDF。一个扩展摘要一切！
short.zh_TW: 由ChatGPT驅動的免費摘要工具，適用於網站、YouTube影片和PDF。一個擴充功能摘要一切！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Gist AI is a free Chrome Extension that extracts the key points from any website article, YouTube video or PDF in just one click. 

Even better, Gist AI lets you deep dive into the summary source for clarity or jump right to that moment in a YouTube video.

Gist AI is the ultimate tool for easy and quick summarization. Summarize everything and learn more in less time!

--------------------------------------------------

Key Features:

- Saves time
Extracts key points from articles, YouTube videos, PDFs, essays, websites, blogs, contracts, research papers and more with just one click.

- Read More of what you like
Our unique "Read More" feature allows you to deep-dive into the source of the summaries that interest you the most. No more fluff or distractions!

- Jump to core segments of a YouTube video
Quickly skim through the summary and only watch the parts of a YouTube video which are relevant to you.

- Summarize any PDF
With Gist AI, you can get summaries for PDFs found online as well as those saved on your device. There are no limits on the size or number of pages. 

- One tool to summarize everything
Why juggle multiple extensions when Gist AI can summarize everything? From websites to YouTube videos to PDFs, Gist has got you covered.

- Understand better
Our research-backed technique improves comprehension and focus by breaking down long articles, PDFs or videos into smaller parts.

- Simple and Easy to Use
All you need to do is install the Chrome extension and get started. No API keys needed.

--------------------------------------------------

Buried under a mountain of content? Gist AI is your reliable and Free online summarizer, crafting comprehensive summaries from even the most complex websites, long PDFs or videos. Gist AI improves comprehension and focus by transforming long content into short, easy-to-understand segments.

Gist AI is the trusted choice among a diverse range of professionals—from corporations and law firms to government entities and hospitals. Our software stands out for its efficiency in condensing large documents into quick insights.

Upgrade your reading experience with Gist AI today!
long.en,ms:
Gist AI is a free and powerful Chrome Extension that extracts the key points from any website article, YouTube video or PDF in just one click. 

Even better, Gist AI lets you deep dive into the summary source for clarity or jump right to that moment in a YouTube video.

Gist AI is the ultimate tool for easy and quick summarization. Summarize everything and learn more in less time!

--------------------------------------------------

Key Features:

- Saves time
Extracts key points from articles, YouTube videos, large PDFs, essays, websites, blogs, contracts, research papers and more with just one click.

- Read More of what you like
Our unique "Read More" feature allows you to deep-dive into the source of the summaries that interest you the most. No more fluff or distractions!

- Jump to core segments of a YouTube video
Quickly skim through the summary and only watch the parts of a YouTube video which are relevant to you.

- Summarize any PDF
With Gist AI PDF Summarizer, you can get summaries for PDFs found online as well as those saved on your device. There are no limits on the size or number of pages. 

- One tool to summarize everything
Why juggle multiple extensions when Gist AI can summarize everything? From websites to YouTube videos to PDFs, Gist has got you covered.

- Understand better
Our research-backed technique improves comprehension and focus by breaking down long articles, PDFs or videos into smaller parts.

- Simple and Easy to Use
All you need to do is install the Chrome extension and get started. No API keys needed.

- Unlimited Summarization
Leveraging the power of ChatGPT AI, Gist AI offers unlimited summarization capabilities. You can summarize as many PDFs, YouTube videos or websites as you want without any limitations.

- Translation Support
Translate the summary into 30+ languages.

--------------------------------------------------

Buried under a mountain of content? Gist AI is your reliable and Free online AI summarizer, crafting comprehensive summaries from even the most complex websites, long PDFs or videos. Gist AI improves comprehension and focus by transforming long content into short, easy-to-understand segments.

Gist AI is the trusted choice among a diverse range of professionals—from corporations and law firms to government entities and hospitals. Our software stands out for its efficiency in condensing large documents into quick insights.

Upgrade your reading experience with Gist AI today!

Privacy and Security:
We prioritize your privacy. Gist AI ensures that your PDFs and summarized content remain secure and protected.
